attributes.action: MAKE SIR RICHARD ATTENBOROUGH A PEER OF THE REALM.
attributes.additional_details: Use your influence to do a popular act which will warm the hearts of the people of these islands and the world
attributes.background: Sir David Attenborough is beloved of this Nation and indeed most of the globe.  He deserves the highest honours his country can give.  He was born c. 2 weeks after our own Queen Elizabeth II. Please don't leave this any longer.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
